title: The Gallos
description: Never read the Men of Inked series? This is a great introduction to the series or an addition for current readers. -- This is a PREQUEL to Throttle Me --  This is a SHORT story featuring the entire Gallo family and told from Mr. & Mrs. Gallo's point of view.  The Gallos are a loving Italian family filled with alpha males and one sassy sister.  Each book in the series focuses on a different sibling.
author: Chelle Bliss
